articles.description: Anderson Cooper discusses the historic second impeachment trial of Donald Trump with Watergate whistleblower John Dean and how President Trump is likely to be viewed historically.

articles.description: Anderson Cooper takes viewer questions about being surprised by interviewees and discusses the strong influence his father has had on him.

articles.title: Someone tried to poison a Florida city by hacking into the water treatment system, sheriff says
articles.description: A hacker gained access into the water treatment system of Oldsmar, Florida, on Friday and tried to increase the levels of sodium hydroxide -- commonly referred to as lye -- in the city's water, officials said, putting thousands at risk of being poisoned.

articles.title: How Trumpism is on the march in Arkansas

articles.author: Kara Scannell, CNN
articles.title: Paul Manafort can't be prosecuted on state charges, New York court rules
articles.description: The New York state appeals court denied the Manhattan district attorney's effort to bring criminal charges against Paul Manafort after he was pardoned by then-President Donald Trump.

articles.title: A mom built a simpler Covid-19 vaccine sign-up website for her state while on maternity leave

articles.author: Clare Duffy and Natasha Chen, CNN Business
articles.title: Disney California Adventure Park to bring back 1,000 workers in limited reopening
articles.description: Some Disney fans will finally have the chance to return to the California Adventure Park next month for a limited-time experience, about a year after the entertainment giant's theme parks closed because of the pandemic.

articles.author: Amanda Watts, Rebekah Riess and Ana Melgar Zuniga, CNN
articles.title: Grandfather sentenced in 2019 death of his granddaughter from a cruise ship window
articles.description: The man who pleaded guilty in the death of his 18-month-old granddaughter aboard a Royal Caribbean cruise ship in 2019 was sentenced Monday to three years of probation, according to a statement from the Puerto Rican government.
